<h3 id="X38035">X(38035) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(1), X(4), X(6)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^6-(b+c)*a^5-(3*b^2-2*b*c+3*c^2)*a^4-2*b*c*(b+c)*a^3+(b^2+4*b*c+c^2)*(b-c)^2*a^2+(b^4-c^4)*(b-c)*a+(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38035) = X(1)+2*X(5480) = X(4)+2*X(1386) = 4*X(5)-X(3416) = X(6)+2*X(946) = X(40)-4*X(3589) = 2*X(141)-5*X(8227) = 2*X(182)+X(12699) = X(355)-4*X(19130) = 2*X(597)+X(31162) = X(962)+5*X(3618) = 4*X(1125)-X(1350) = X(1351)+5*X(18493) = 3*X(14561)-X(38116) = 3*X(14561)-2*X(38167) = 3*X(38023)-2*X(38029) = 3*X(38023)-4*X(38040) = 3*X(38047)-2*X(38116) = 3*X(38047)-4*X(38167) = 3*X(38072)-X(38144) = 3*X(38072)-2*X(38146)</b>
<p>X(38035) lies on these lines: {1,5480}, {4,1386}, {5,3416}, {6,946}, {30,38023}, {40,3589}, {141,8227}, {182,12699}, {355,19130}, {511,5886}, {516,5085}, {517,14561}, {518,5603}, {519,38072}, {524,38021}, {597,31162}, {611,30384}, {613,12047}, {952,38136}, {962,3618}, {971,38046}, {1125,1350}, {1351,18493}, {1352,9955}, {1385,31670}, {1428,1836}, {1469,11376}, {1503,1699}, {1702,13910}, {1703,13972}, {2330,12701}, {2829,38050}, {3056,11375}, {3086,24471}, {3090,3844}, {3242,13464}, {3545,28538}, {3564,38034}, {3576,29181}, {3653,19924}, {3656,5476}, {3751,11522}, {3817,5847}, {4657,6210}, {5102,34379}, {5138,5805}, {5587,5846}, {5820,22835}, {5842,38051}, {5845,38036}, {5848,38038}, {5849,38039}, {5901,21850}, {8229,17723}, {9053,16200}, {9812,25406}, {9970,12261}, {10165,31884}, {10387,13411}, {10752,32238}, {11496,36741}, {12588,17605}, {13374,24476}, {17301,29057}, {17792,25681}, {18483,36990}, {18583,22791}, {22753,36740}, {28174,38110}, {28194,38118}, {28198,38064}</p>
<p>
X(38035) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {1699, 16475}, {5603, 14853}, {9812, 25406}<br>
X(38035) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (5085, 38049), (10516, 3817), (31884, 10165), (38029, 38040), (38047, 14561), (38116, 38167), (38144, 38146)<br>
X(38035) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (14561, 38116, 38167), (38029, 38040, 38023), (38072, 38144, 38146), (38116, 38167, 38047), (38147, 38148, 38136)<br>
</p>
